special_text:
[i](Choose only one page as a sorcery to add its effects.)[/i]
Modal spells and split spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
{9} Canto I
When you choose this page and at the beginning of your upkeep, search target player’s library for a card and exile it. That player shuffles. Copy the exiled card. You may cast the copy without paying its mana cost.
{9} Canto VI
{5}{W}{U}{B}{R}{G}, {T}, Shuffle [i]The Chronicles of Yor-Om[/i] into its owner’s library: Target player loses the game.
